activities: As a global management consulting organization, TMC receives personal information through corporate enterprise-wide licenses, self-assessment tools, enrollments in workshops, professional certification, and print/reprint publication orders.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TRUSTe Safe Harbor serves as our third party recourse mechanism for non-HR personal data; EU and Swiss Data Protection Authorities for HR Data
